text.__SUMMARY__:
Solanum leucodendron is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae.
The plant is endemic to the Atlantic Forest ecoregion in southeastern Brazil.
text.See also: List of plants of Atlantic Forest vegetation of Brazil
text.Sources: Carvalho, L.d'A.F. (1998). "Solanum leucodendron". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T37991A10086968. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T37991A10086968.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
